resources.string:
Tension scale

70-100 - High tension

You can barely stand the tension. Clear thinking is not possible. Loss of control.

30-69 - Medium tension

You can clearly notice your tension and feel uneasy.

0-29 - Low tension

You are relaxed and well-balanced.

Tension assessment

Pay attention to your...

Thoughts

How fast are your thoughts? Can you control them?

Body

Do your shoulders or your chops feel tense or relaxed?

Breathing

How fast or shallow is your breathing?
